Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Stephen King will be writing the entirety of Season 2 of Stranger Things, which is not true.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or official announcement from the creators of Stranger Things that Stephen King will be involved in writing Season 2.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Stephen King will be writing the second season based on a satirical website's report, which is not a reliable source of information.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the Duffer brothers, the creators of Stranger Things, have not made any announcements about handing over writing duties to Stephen King or any other writers.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the comparison between Stranger Things and the works of Stephen King and Steven Spielberg led to the false claim that Stephen King would be writing Season 2.
